DeleteCanary.name: DeleteCanary
DeleteCanary.description:
Deletes a canary. Amazon Synthetics deletes all the resources except for the Lambda
                                                function and the CloudWatch Alarms if you created one.

DescribeCanariesLastRun.name: DescribeCanariesLastRun
DescribeCanariesLastRun.description: Returns information about the last test run associated with all canaries.

GetCanaryRuns.name: GetCanaryRuns
GetCanaryRuns.description: Returns information about all the test runs associated with a canary.

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Returns a list of all tags and values associated with a canary.

StartCanary.name: StartCanary
StartCanary.description: Starts a canary, so that Amazon Synthetics starts monitoring a website.

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Adds one or more tags to a canary.

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Removes one or more tags from a canary.
